dc_description_s: Data collected and prepared for a project of the World Bank Group in February 2017. Includes transmission lines, substations, as well as power stations. Includes existing as well as planned projects. Some existing lines extracted from OSM data © OpenStreetMap contributors. The majority of the data is based on a digitized PDF map, and so is intended as a schematic of rough locations of the power network. It is not suitable for applications requiring high accuracy. The World Bank and the International Finance Corporation, collectively the World Bank Group (WBG) strives to enhance public access to and use of data that can support development impact.
